title: Private Music Theory Class (Online)
description: Learn ABRSM & Trinity theory from Grade 1 to 8. Covers notation, scales, harmony, rhythm, and composition.

title: Private Basic Piano Class (Online)
description: Learn posture, hand technique, reading music, chords, melody & harmony, and recital preparation.

title: Academic Piano Class (Online)
description: Structured piano lessons based on ABRSM & Trinity syllabuses. Focus on performance, scales, and music theory.

title: Home Tutoring Piano Class (In-Person)
description: Personalized piano lessons at your home. Includes matching theory lessons for ABRSM Grades 1–8.

title: 5 Keys to Music
description: Fun group course introducing musical fundamentals — rhythm, melody, and notation based on ABRSM beginner levels.
